1549630.name: Expressway Rally 首都高速路霸
1549630.description:
Welcome to Seaside Rally: Wave Sprint!

Race through stunning coastal tracks in this exhilarating arcade-style rally game. Take the wheel of adorable Q-style rally cars and conquer challenging courses set along scenic ocean roads. Perfect for players of all ages, Seaside Rally offers easy-to-learn controls and fast-paced gameplay that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Key Features:

Charming Visuals: Explore beautifully designed seaside environments filled with vibrant colors and detailed landscapes.
Exciting Gameplay: Master tight turns, perform daring jumps, and race against AI opponents in thrilling races.
Customizable Cars: Unlock and customize a variety of Q-style rally cars, each with unique attributes and appearances.
Multiple Game Modes: Challenge yourself in Career mode, compete against friends in local multiplayer, or set new records in Time Trial mode.
Family-Friendly Fun: Suitable for players of all skill levels, from beginners to experienced racers.
Jump into Seaside Rally: Wave Sprint and experience the thrill of high-speed racing on the coast like never before!
